Key Match Events: Washington effectively sealed the outcome with a 7-0 run early in the fourth to build a 20-point lead, their biggest of the night.
Others: Jordan Poole made six 3-pointers and topped 25 points for a fifth straight game, the first such stretch of his career.
Rookie Alex Sarr added 11 points and 10 rebounds as one of seven players in double figures to help the last-place Wizards to their largest win of the season.
Zach LaVine scored 32 points for the Bulls after he sat out Monday's win in Charlotte with toe soreness.
